subtitles: 16099 18310 First, there was darkness.
19853 22689 Then came the Strangers.

22689 25484 They were a race
as old as time itself.

26527 29238 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

29279 34535 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

34576 37204 They called this ability
"Tuning."
38372 40249 But they were dying.

40290 43335 Their civilization was
in decline,

43335 46088 and so they abandoned
their world,

46171 48841 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

50217 53679 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

53720 55848 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
56890 58350 Our world.

59393 61395 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

61436 63355 what they had been
searching for.

74157 77035 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
78036 79705 I am just a man.

79705 82541 I help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
84084 86211 I have betrayed my own kind.
293585 295420 You are confused, aren't you?

295420 298257 Frightened. That's all right.
I can help you.

298257 299925 -Who is this?
-I'm a doctor.

299967 302636 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

302678 304805 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

304847 307015 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

307099 309142 No, I don't understand.
What's going on here?

309142 311979 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

312020 314273 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
315482 317651 Hello? Are you there?

359818 362279 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
362321 363822 Said you left your wallet there.

364865 368493 I suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
368535 370329 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
372372 373874 I've been here three weeks?

373874 377044 It's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
377085 379505 Day and date.

379546 382841 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

382883 385886 -I'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

385928 388055 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
388096 389515 is cash on the barrelhead!

407366 410077 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
410118 412663 No days off for good behavior.

423590 427261 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

427261 430764 He just left
not five minutes ago.

436478 440482 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
440524 442693 Dance with me
442734 445779 Make me sway
445779 449783 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
449825 452035 Hold me close
452077 454955 Sway me more

454955 459251 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
459293 461753 Bend with me
461753 464590 Sway with ease

464631 468594 When we dance,
you have a way with me
468635 471138 Stay with me
471138 473682 Sway with me

474516 478520 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
478604 480105 He wanted to speak with you.

503545 505130 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

505172 509176 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

510511 513972 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
514014 515474 What is this?

515516 519061 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

519144 522773 I don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

522814 525359 but he never
mentioned you to me.

525359 528195 The truth is, John has been
coming to see me...
528237 529696 for quite some time.

529696 533075 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

533116 536161 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

536203 538121 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

539498 541792 When was the last time
that you saw him?

541834 544711 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
544753 547256 He was very angry at me.

547339 550175 I understand how difficult
this must be for you,
550217 551510 but for John's sake,

551552 554513 I would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

554555 558225 It appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

558267 561395 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

561436 564356 Oh, but I am.
He may be delusional.
564398 565691 Even violent.

567025 570988 If he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

571029 573490 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
575242 576451 For himself.

586628 590549 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
591466 594928 Mr. "J" something Murdoch?

598265 602477 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

606773 608859 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

608901 611486 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
617826 619578 Got to get a grip on myself.

643685 647022 I told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

647105 650400 I said, "Listen,
three weeks is three weeks."

650442 653987 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
655280 656615 The call girl.

661245 664164 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-Inspector Bumstead.
664164 665916 Your lace is untied.
676844 678470 Am I glad you're here, sir.

678512 681139 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

681181 683350 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

714214 716758 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

719219 721013 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

721722 724391 -You left your wallet here.
-When did I do that?

724433 726685 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

726727 730063 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

735903 738655 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

756048 757883 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
757925 759259 And where's home?

759259 762054 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
762095 764389 I'm just doing my job, May.
764431 766433 There's a killer out there.

766475 769144 Look for him
instead of cooling your heels.
772439 774191 Go on. Get out of here.

787454 790249 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

790249 793168 -I believe so, sir.
-Give the man an "A" for effort.
798590 800926 So, Husselbeck,

800968 807432 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

807474 809309 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

809351 812646 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
812646 813772 thanks to Walenski.

813814 815607 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

815649 818735 I've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

818777 820988 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
820988 822948 he let drift a long time ago.
822990 824783 Let me talk to Bumstead!
824825 826869 Come on! Hold on!

831790 833834 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

833876 836128 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
837546 839256 God, can't you see?

842676 845012 Let me go!
I'm not going to hurt you.

846555 848807 -What was that?
-Walenski.

857149 860277 I'm being punished
for my sins, right?

860319 864656 What did I ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

864656 867618 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
867659 869077 should be here, so--

869119 871747 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

874041 875918 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

882508 885844 I came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

885844 889264 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
891558 893227 His name's John Murdoch.

896230 899566 Do these names mean
anything to you?
900442 902402 Who are these women?

902444 904321 Why are you looking
for my husband?

904363 906615 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

906657 910202 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

911620 914873 -Which one?
-All of them.

916291 919586 Mrs. Murdoch, I am sorry.
I didn't mean to alarm you.

919628 922381 I'm sorry that I came.
I just made a mistake.

922422 926218 If you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
935602 936812 We met before?

938438 941525 If we did,
I hope you're still breathing.
941567 943110 What's your name, honey?

946905 948699 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
956623 957916 I was just thinking.

964923 969970 It seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

970012 971972 How do you know
I'm not the killer?

971972 975267 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

976185 978437 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1039331 1043168 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1043210 1047005 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question.

1130172 1133300 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1133425 1136512 -It is said he is able to Tune.
-Impossible!

1136595 1139640 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1139640 1142518 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1142518 1145062 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1145145 1148774 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1148815 1150943 But this one was different, yes?

1150984 1154738 -What has the doctor to say?
-He has failed to report in.

1154780 1157908 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1157950 1160577 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1163956 1166583 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1166583 1169545 Mr. Book...does he know?
1170546 1172631 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1173632 1176510 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1176552 1179513 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1179513 1181807 We must have this man.
1187688 1188856 My brand, I hope.
1201201 1202786 I've been worried about you.
1206832 1208166 Are you punishing me?

1208917 1211545 If disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1211587 1212796 I don't appreciate it.
1212838 1214006 What are you talking about?

1217509 1221305 I found these keys in my pocket,
so I assume I live here.

1223515 1225851 -You supposed to be my wife?
-"Supposed to be"?

1229354 1233358 You really...don't know
who I am, do you.

1234234 1237029 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1241283 1244995 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1252753 1254755 Feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1254796 1257591 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1258217 1259718 I had an affair.
1261595 1262930 You were angry at me.

1266099 1269770 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1279488 1281823 Most unfortunate it is...

1281823 1284159 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1285118 1289289 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1290165 1293460 -I'm sorry. I--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1293502 1296463 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1296463 1300008 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1300092 1302761 We found this in his hotel room.

1302761 1306265 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1306306 1308475 I tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1308517 1310686 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1310769 1313939 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1313939 1315482 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1315482 1318235 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1318986 1320696 You have had strays
before, right?

1320737 1324616 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1324616 1327703 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1327744 1330038 You will process
another template...
1330080 1332124 of the subject's memories, yes?

1332165 1333750 Of course.
I'll imprint him again.

1335335 1338630 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1338630 1341466 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1341508 1343302 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1343343 1346305 but no more delays, yes?

1346305 1351143 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1353020 1354646 The police were looking for you.
1354646 1356815 I know. I saw the papers.

1356857 1359359 "Killer stalks
city street-walkers."
1362988 1365282 I was with one of those women.

1366825 1370245 -Before I came here tonight.
-I don't understand.

1370287 1375209 I met her outside an Automat.
I guess I wanted to test myself.

1376919 1380339 I wanted to know if I had it
in me to do those things.
1380339 1381840 Maybe I have lost my mind,

1381882 1384885 but whoever I am, I'm still me,
and I'm not a killer.
1390891 1392267 I believe you.

1399858 1401860 -What?
-The car outside.
1401902 1403362 The one you arrived in.

1403403 1405697 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1407866 1409618 I didn't know he was still here.
1413205 1414665 Hold it right there, mister!

1417084 1420087 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1420128 1421588 I didn't kill anyone.

1421630 1423924 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1423966 1427219 Turn yourself in. I'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1427261 1429304 You won't believe
what I have to say.

1430430 1433767 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1433767 1437437 It's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1437437 1440274 And I don't even know if...
they're not even--

1440274 1442526 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1442568 1445070 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1449408 1451368 No one ever listens to me.
1457666 1458750 Murdoch, stop!

1501627 1503962 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1507508 1509843 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1509885 1512971 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1513013 1515516 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1518519 1521688 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1521772 1524858 I can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1524942 1526235 or the Crosstown.

1530906 1533951 I'm sorry, lnspector,
I cannot be of more assistance,

1534034 1535994 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1536036 1538163 Well, I appreciate you
taking the time.

1546880 1549341 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1549341 1553887 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1553929 1556682 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1556723 1559893 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1559893 1562729 Well, I do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1562813 1567025 Inspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1567025 1569027 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1569069 1573031 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1573073 1576159 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1576243 1578495 Consumed by details.

1578537 1582040 I would say
your life is rather lonely.

1582082 1584710 Good evening, lnspector.
I really must be going.

1628545 1630339 -How is he?
-The same.
1631632 1634259 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1640641 1641850 Come in, Frank.
1645145 1646271 Close the door.

1654363 1657658 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1657699 1659785 It's an interesting case.
1660911 1664122 Kind that make a man's career.

1665832 1669461 -Or break it.
-Yeah. I was on that case.

1669503 1673340 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1673382 1674800 Nothing happened, Frank.

1675843 1677845 I've just been spending time
in the subway,
1677886 1679805 riding in circles.

1679847 1683392 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1685686 1687354 I've been over this entire city.

1691817 1693694 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1693735 1695237 She's not my wife.

1697072 1700033 I don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1700075 1703453 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1705497 1706999 As much as the next guy.

1708000 1710752 See, I've been trying
to remember things--

1710794 1713881 clearly remember things
from my past.

1713922 1716091 But the more
I try to think back,

1716175 1719178 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1719219 1720387 None of it seems real.

1720387 1724558 It's like I've just
been dreaming this life,

1724558 1727561 and when I finally wake up,
I'll be somebody else,
1727561 1729521 somebody totally different.

1733942 1736069 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1737237 1739740 Something to do with the case.

1740365 1743744 There is no case!
There never was!

1743785 1747706 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
1788747 1790499 Tonight's requirements are...
1790541 1793794 12 family photo albums,
1793836 1796255 nine personal diaries,
1798465 1800926 assorted childhood photographs,

1800968 1805138 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1805138 1807474 These do bring back memories.
1809810 1812104 This one is still warm.

1813981 1817234 The recollections of
a great lover?
1817276 1819570 A catalogue of conquests?
1820279 1821780 We will soon find out.

1823073 1824575 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1824616 1827828 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1827870 1832165 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1835544 1838255 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1843969 1846513 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1848140 1851226 And last but not least...

1851226 1853854 a tragic death
in the family.

1865324 1868911 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1868952 1873207 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1873248 1874499 A freak of nature.

1874499 1877336 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1877377 1879296 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1879338 1882007 Isn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1882007 1885344 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1885385 1888263 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1888347 1889890 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1893936 1895812 It requires several
of your lifetimes...
1895854 1897523 to master our gifts.

1897564 1899358 The idea that
a simple man...

1899399 1901401 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1901443 1902569 Absurd, I know.
1902569 1904905 What other explanation is there?
1956957 1958417 Shut it down.

1976977 1980063 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1980105 1981940 It's about time, dear.
2058058 2060185 Can anyone hear me?
2063355 2066191 Let the Tuning commence.
2226059 2227436 The Goodwins.
2227436 2229396 Charlie, Sylvia,
2229479 2231565 Jane, and little Matthew.
2235444 2237654 Jane and little Matthew.
2267809 2270103 The rich get richer.

2270145 2272147 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2272231 2273607 before the night
is through.
2327160 2329121 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2331790 2333959 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2333959 2336086 if that's what you are.
2337629 2339464 Why is everyone asleep?
2339506 2341884 Please keep your voice down.

2341967 2343844 I can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2343886 2346680 Nothing. I want to help you.

2346722 2350142 We cannot talk here.
If they see us together--

2350184 2353061 I don't care.
I want some answers. Now!

2353145 2356190 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2363572 2366617 -You really can do it.
-I did that?

2366658 2369286 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2369328 2371288 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2371330 2372915 They call it "Tuning."

2372956 2374917 That is how they change
the buildings.

2375000 2377503 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2377544 2380339 but I can teach you
to control your power.

2380339 2384343 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2443360 2445696 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2445737 2448574 Iollygagging around
as he did.

2448615 2451493 So I told Fredrickson
I was letting him go.
2451535 2453537 Well you should have, darling.

2454246 2457332 He attacked me.
I don't know where he's gone.

2457833 2461795 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2466842 2473307 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2474349 2482399 Though you say it isn't so

2485277 2492117 But if you put me down
for another
2493702 2499625 I'll know, believe me, I'll know

2501084 2504630 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2504630 2508675 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2508717 2511720 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2511803 2513347 There is no Avenue M.

2513388 2515307 We were unable
to complete it.

2515349 2518810 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2518852 2522022 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2522105 2526318 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2526360 2528320 He is becoming like us.
2528320 2531782 So we must become like him.
2532699 2535035 The doctor has done as we asked?

2535077 2538789 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2540791 2543377 We must not do this.

2543418 2546839 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2546839 2549675 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2549716 2553178 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2553220 2554429 will be known to us.

2554513 2559601 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2559685 2562062 But to imprint one of us?
2562104 2564815 Failure has always resulted.

2564857 2568402 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2575492 2577411 This may sting a bit.
2618118 2621955 I have John Murdoch in mind.

2624249 2628253 "Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2628295 2630589 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2630589 2632424 "Stop by sometime.

2632466 2635761 "We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2635802 2638138 "Love to Emma. Karl."
2646438 2648106 Karl Harris.

2665624 2668669 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2668710 2669962 Try the subway.
2673674 2675175 You got a problem, pal?
2675217 2678053 Been working here long?

2678136 2681473 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2706582 2709501 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2743744 2745829 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2745871 2747706 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2747748 2750501 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2750542 2753045 But instead
we have been brought here.

2753086 2757132 -This is irrational.
-Instincts are irrational.

2757216 2760469 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2760552 2763764 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2765224 2767267 He does not care about our job.
2767267 2770103 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
2770145 2772731 If you were Murdoch, yes?
2772773 2776109 If I were Murdoch...

2777945 2781448 I would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2781490 2783534 by sleeping with another man.

2788497 2791917 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2794920 2799508 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2803178 2805264 All change,
platform three.

2809142 2811478 Excuse me, how do I get
to the end of the line?
2811478 2812938 You want the Express.
2825534 2827995 How come the train didn't stop?
2828036 2829329 That's the Express.
2830873 2832791 There's no way out.

2832833 2835627 You can't get out of the city.
I've tried.
2836753 2838839 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2838881 2840549 The one
they've been looking for.
2840632 2841717 You're not a killer.

2841800 2844511 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2844511 2846180 Iike everyone else here.

2846180 2848140 -Who are you?
-I was a cop.
2848182 2851310 At least in this life I was.
2851351 2854188 They steal peoples' memories.

2854188 2855981 Then they swap them around
between us.

2855981 2858734 I seen them do it,
back and forth...

2858775 2860903 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2860944 2862237 How do you know all this?

2862279 2864072 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2864114 2865532 while they're changing things.

2866450 2868952 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2868994 2870329 It happened to me.
2870996 2872915 They'll come looking for you.

2874041 2876376 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2877836 2879087 I figured a way out.
2890557 2891767 They were here.
2895354 2897523 This was to be his home.
2900192 2901985 That was when we loved her.
2902027 2904363 This is all well and good,

2904404 2906406 but we require
a more practical link...
2906448 2908492 to his present whereabouts.
2913121 2915165 And I know where to find her.

2923590 2926927 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2928053 2930097 To be able to revisit
those places...

2930097 2932099 which meant
so very much to us.

2932933 2935477 I thought we were haunted
by them.

2937271 2939731 There used to be a ferry
when I was a boy.
2939731 2941859 Biggest thing you ever saw.

2941900 2944736 Lit up like
a floating birthday cake.

2946113 2948699 That's just what my husband
once said to me.
2948740 2950284 On this very spot.
2951785 2953871 Where is your husband now?

2953912 2957749 I wish I knew.
What brings you here?
2957749 2960627 I met my wife at this place.
2960669 2962921 It's where I met my husband.
2962963 2964464 Small world.
3066942 3068819 What are you doing here?
3068861 3070487 I've been following you.
3074408 3076118 Hold it right there!
3082291 3083584 It's been so damn long,

3083625 3085752 I thought you'd forgotten
your Uncle Karl.
3086962 3088380 You son of a gun!

3099975 3102102 -Is that me?
-Yeah.

3110402 3112154 Shell Beach is where
I grew up?

3112196 3114823 That's what I said.
Shell Beach.

3114865 3117284 -Your home town.
-I need to get there.
3117326 3118368 How do I get there?

3119786 3122706 I don't know.
I haven't been there in years.

3122748 3125626 You must remember.
You must have some idea.
3127586 3128837 Sorry, Johnny.

3130255 3132799 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3136637 3140098 -It was so bright there.
-Brighter times, I guess.

3141808 3145145 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3145187 3147105 That's me and your Pa.

3147147 3149483 What a couple of
handsome fools.
3149483 3151068 What happened to my parents?
3153612 3154738 Where are they now?
3155989 3157783 They're dead, Johnny.

3157824 3160577 They died when the house
burned down.
3160619 3162246 I looked after you.

3163163 3164915 You don't remember that,
really?
3167751 3170254 What's that? What is that?

3178011 3180347 You burned your arm pretty bad
in the fire.
3185894 3187479 What does it mean?
3187521 3189481 It means these are all lies!

3193527 3195904 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3195946 3198740 He told me he wanted
to test himself.
3212337 3214173 I wanted to talk to her.

3214214 3216175 I thought she could
help me find him.
3217885 3219887 I'm going to call the station.
3236028 3237237 It's beautiful.
3239948 3242784 It was a gift from my mother.
3242826 3244369 She died recently.

3245746 3248040 I keep it with me
to remind me of her.
3254880 3257049 It's a funny thing, though.

3257049 3259551 I can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3261970 3264431 How do you think I could
forget a thing like that?
3265933 3268393 What's happening, lnspector?
3268435 3270229 I'm not sure I know anymore.

3274191 3275943 I left your old room
like it was.
3276985 3279238 You can sleep here tonight.
3279279 3281406 Glad to have you back, Johnny.

3281406 3284201 -Even if it is for just a night.
-Karl.

3285327 3287996 -Is that the right time?
-Why, sure.

3288038 3290457 That clock's kept perfect time
since I bought it.

3293502 3295921 -What do you think?
-I don't understand.

3295921 3298757 How can it be night already?
What happened to the day?

3298757 3301260 You're tired.
Anything's possible.
3302970 3303971 Get some sleep.

3303971 3306473 We'll straighten all this out
tomorrow.

3360194 3363197 He's here.
He's acting peculiar.
3363238 3365616 I know. He's not himself.

3365657 3367701 Keep him there,
and I'll be right over.

3367743 3369995 -I'll try.
-Thanks. Bye.

3373540 3376919 I can't promise anything.
We'll play it as it comes.
3377669 3380506 We just wanted to help.
3387221 3390891 Karl. Uncle Karl.

3390891 3394394 If you're in trouble,
maybe we can do something.
3395812 3398315 Haven't seen you in so long.

3472931 3477603 Mr. Murdoch, you've been
the cause of much distress.

3482399 3484776 -Start talking.
-There's no need for this.

3484818 3488405 There's no escape.
The city's ours. We made it.
3488447 3489781 What are you talking about?

3489823 3492910 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories.

3492951 3496705 Different eras, different pasts,
all rolled into one.

3496747 3500792 Each night we revise it,
refine it, in order to learn.

3500834 3503879 -Learn what?
-About you.

3503962 3508300 You and your fellow inhabitants.
What makes you human.

3508342 3511845 -Why?
-We need to be like you.
3512679 3514848 I understand you now.

3514848 3518477 I remember that which you do
not, what you've been missing.

3518519 3523982 The ocean, yes? Running along
the waves as a child.

3524024 3528529 Meeting Emma at the river,
that first kiss that followed.

3529530 3532658 -What are you?
-You've seen what we are.
3532699 3535285 We use your dead as vessels.

3681473 3685352 -What about her? Ring a bell?
-She was alive when I left her.

3685394 3688438 -What about this?
-This is nothing.

3688480 3690691 It must mean something--
all those pictures.
3690732 3691733 What pictures?

3693193 3696029 -I don't understand this.
-Stop playing games with me.

3696113 3698574 -Stop telling me lies.
-I am not telling lies!

3698615 3700951 Help me out.
Make me understand.

3700993 3705956 I have this jigsaw puzzle in
my face, and it makes no sense.

3705998 3709334 You think it makes sense to me?
I'm as confused as you are.

3709376 3713338 Let me ask you a question.
Have you heard of Shell Beach?

3713338 3715507 -Sure.
-You know how to get there?

3717759 3723015 -Right. You just go to the...
-Where? Where do you go?
3723056 3724725 Give me a second, will you?
3726685 3728270 You can't remember, can you?
3729646 3732149 Thinking that's kind of odd?
3733358 3735444 Wait. I got a better one.

3735485 3739239 When was the last time you
did something during the day?

3739865 3742826 -What do you mean?
-I just mean during the day.

3744036 3746788 Daylight. When was the last
time you remember seeing it?

3746830 3750542 I'm not talking about a distant,
half-forgotten childhood memory.

3750584 3753378 I mean, like, yesterday.
Last week? When?
3754296 3756048 Do you have a single memory?
3757883 3759551 You don't, do you?

3759593 3765140 I don't think the sun
even exists in this place.

3765224 3769394 'Cause I've been up for hours
and hours, and night never ends.

3769978 3772231 -That's crazy.
-You're damn right it's crazy.

3772231 3775859 But listen to me, Bumstead.
It's not just me.

3775901 3778779 It's all of us. They're doing
something to all of us.

3778862 3780739 Shut up.
I've heard enough.

3780739 3783492 -Please listen--
-Shut up!
3793919 3796755 There has to be an explanation.
3804137 3805097 Explain this.

3829496 3832457 I never meant to hurt you.
I don't know why I did.
3832457 3834251 I wish I could take it back.
3834960 3837254 You didn't do it.
3837296 3839006 This affair of yours,

3839047 3842134 whatever you think you've done,
you didn't do it.
3842134 3843343 I don't believe it happened.

3843385 3847181 -What do you mean?
-This will sound crazy.

3847222 3850350 What if we never knew
each other before now?

3850392 3856607 What if the first time we met
was last night in our apartment?
3856648 3859359 And everything you remember,

3859443 3862654 and everything I'm supposed to
remember never really happened.

3862696 3865157 Someone just wants us
to think it did.
3866116 3867618 But how can that be true?

3868243 3871246 I so vividly remember
meeting you.

3872539 3874917 I remember falling in love
with you.

3876502 3879505 -I remember losing you.
-Time's up.

3881048 3885844 No, wait, please.
Just one more minute.
3892392 3893894 I love you, John.

3897231 3899399 You can't fake something
like that.
3931932 3934476 Inspector? Sir?

3935894 3938564 Detective Walenski
killed himself last night.
3940899 3942276 I thought you should know.

3944945 3949283 The chief wanted to see you.
Sir?

3956206 3958083 I knew you'd track
the killer down.

3987905 3991074 -How can we help you, sir?
-You can sleep.

4014014 4017643 I wanted to be the first to
congratulate you about the case.
4020229 4022981 Take us to Murdoch.
4054555 4056181 I knew you'd come eventually.

4056223 4058725 Isn't it time
you gave me some answers?

4060060 4062729 Yes, of course.
Won't you please sit down?
4066024 4067901 I come here often.

4067943 4070487 It's one of the few places
I'm allowed some peace.

4070946 4073991 You see, they have
an aversion to water.

4074992 4076994 One could almost call it
a phobia.

4077452 4080080 Who are they?
What do they want from me?

4081832 4086545 For now, let's say you're
the subject of their experiment.

4089715 4095554 I'm sorry, but I have no time
to do this the right way.

4095596 4099600 Everything you need to know
is in this syringe.

4099641 4103228 I need you to inject yourself.
It's the only way to understand.

4103270 4106064 -You're kidding, right?
-We're running out of time!

4106106 4109735 -You have to do this now.
-Give me the gun.

4109776 4111904 He's more disturbed
than we thought.

4111945 4114823 I may not be the judge
of personality you are,

4114865 4117826 but you're the one
who looks disturbed.

4117910 4120412 You don't know what
you're doing.
4121622 4125542 What exactly is in this, Doctor?

4127252 4130422 All the answers you've been
looking for, I swear to you.

4132341 4138138 Guess I'll hold on to it for
safekeeping, if you don't mind.
4138138 4139473 Let's go, Doctor.
4141016 4144186 Go? Where are we going?
4144645 4146313 Shell Beach.

4147439 4150859 That's where you wanted to go,
isn't it, the ocean?

4159743 4163163 Won't find anything there.
I've been there--
4163205 4165541 Then you can show us the way.

4165582 4169253 I won't. I refuse.
You can't make me go there.

4169294 4171713 Don't you understand?
They'll be waiting for us.

4181014 4185519 I don't understand.
There used to be a bridge here.

4190858 4193902 Try that again, and your friends
will find you in the canal.

4193944 4195779 Don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.

4195821 4197573 It doesn't matter anymore
anyway.
4208834 4210377 Who are you people?

4210794 4213589 Must go to the end
of the canal.

4214882 4217509 We will give you some more
pretty things soon...

4218719 4221013 -Anna.
-I'm not Anna.
4222723 4224766 You will be soon, yes.

4229021 4231815 I have another use
for her first.
4241325 4243202 I call them Strangers.

4243785 4246246 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4247414 4251877 This city, everyone in it...
is their experiment.

4251877 4254588 They mix and match our memories
as they see fit,

4254630 4257299 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4257799 4260636 One day, a man might be
an inspector.

4260719 4263472 The next,
someone entirely different.

4263889 4267267 When they want to study
a murderer, for instance,

4267309 4271730 they simply imprint one of their
citizens with a new personality.

4271772 4276068 Arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...
4276109 4277945 even a lost wallet.
4278028 4280155 Then they observe the results.

4281406 4285577 Will a man, given the history of
a killer, continue in that vein?

4286078 4289665 Or are we, in fact, more than
the sum of our memories?

4289706 4294253 This business of you being
a killer was a sad coincidence.

4294920 4297506 You have had dozens of lives
before now.
4297589 4298966 You happened to wake up...

4299007 4301844 while I was imprinting you
with this one.
4301927 4303846 Why are they doing all this?

4303971 4308100 It is our capacity for
individuality, our souls...

4308141 4309977 that makes us different
from them.

4309977 4312479 They think they'll find
the human soul...

4312479 4315148 if they understand
how our memories work.

4315148 4319653 They have collective memories.
They share one group mind.

4319695 4324575 They're dying. Their race is
on the brink of extinction.

4324616 4327619 -They think we can save them.
-Where do I fit in?

4327661 4332207 You're different. You resisted
my attempt to imprint you.

4337129 4340632 Somehow, you have developed
their ability to Tune.

4340632 4343886 That is how they change things,
how they built this city.

4343969 4346847 They have machines buried
beneath the surface...

4346847 4350392 that allow them to focus
their telepathic energies.

4351185 4353812 They control everything here,
even the sun.

4353854 4356940 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
4357024 4358483 Why do they need you?
4358525 4360485 When they first brought us here,

4360485 4364823 they extracted what was in us
and stored the information,
4364823 4366783 remixed it like paint...

4366825 4369328 and gave us back
new memories of their choosing.

4369369 4372998 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

4374750 4379713 I understood the human mind
better than they ever could,

4379755 4383342 so they allowed me to keep
my skills as a scientist...
4383383 4384843 because they needed them.

4384885 4387346 They made me delete
everything else.

4395896 4400359 Can you imagine what it's like
to erase your own past?

4400400 4403654 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
4404530 4406615 Shell Beach. Uncle Karl.

4407824 4411912 What about this?
This was blank when I found it.

4411954 4415832 You still don't understand.
You were never a boy.
4415874 4417209 Not in this place.

4417209 4420087 Your history is an illusion,
a fabrication,
4420128 4421964 as it is with all of us.

4422005 4424550 You made those drawings happen
with your gift.
4424550 4426051 You say they brought us here.
4433308 4436478 I'm sorry. I don't remember.

4437312 4441525 None of us remember that...
what we once were...

4441567 4445112 what we might have been...
somewhere else.

4462921 4466675 I've taken you this far.
You don't need me anymore.
4513138 4515349 There is no ocean, John.
4516683 4518810 There's nothing beyond the city.
4520395 4522856 The only place home exists...
4525108 4526693 is in your head.
4574074 4576201 Now you know the truth.

4635761 4638472 You'll allow yourself
to surrender...

4638472 4640807 or it will result in
this one's death.
4640807 4642017 What do I care?

4642518 4644603 She's not my real wife.
She's nothing to me.

4644645 4649274 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

4649316 4653570 I have become the monster
you were intended to be.

4655489 4659076 Shall I end her life now,
as you would have?

4662621 4667960 -Don't hurt her, please.
-Then surrender.
4716550 4720012 He is powerful, yes, dangerous.

4720053 4723390 But he can also lead us
to what we seek...
4723432 4726602 what the doctor calls the soul.

4726685 4730564 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

4730647 4733442 We no longer need
the other subjects.
4733483 4736820 The time for study is over.

4736820 4741200 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.
4748040 4751376 It is time, Doctor. Imprint.
4754046 4756215 Shut it down!
4757132 4759551 Shut it down forever.
4774191 4775275 What are you doing?

4776193 4780864 They want to imprint you with
their own collective memories.

4781990 4784201 They want to make you
one of them...
4784243 4786411 so they can share your soul.
4786453 4788789 But I've got other plans.

4792167 4795045 Imprint, Doctor.
No more disobedience.

4795087 4799758 I'm sorry. The pain will
only last a moment.
4810853 4812563 Remember, John.

4813564 4815607 You'll rise to greater heights
than that.

4815649 4818110 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

4821780 4824616 That's it, John.
Practice makes perfect.

4824658 4827911 Now, remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.
4828287 4829621 John, remember.

4829830 4832624 You're probably wondering why I
keep appearing in your memories.

4832666 4835085 It's because I have
inserted myself in them.

4835127 4839131 They were fabricated to
teach you about the Strangers.

4839131 4842301 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.

4845137 4849808 You will survive, John. You'll
find strength within yourself.
4849850 4851351 And you will prevail.

4853896 4856106 -Hi, Uncle Karl.
-Johnny!

4859026 4863155 Getting the hang of it, John.
Maybe one day I'll work for you.

4863780 4867409 Here's the machine the Strangers
use to amplify their thoughts,

4867451 4869203 the machine that changes
their world.

4869244 4872497 You must take control of it.
You must make the machine yours.

4872539 4877169 I know you can beat them,
but you must concentrate.
4879171 4880380 Something's wrong.
4889223 4891058 There is no time for romance.

4891099 4893227 The world can be
what you make it.
4894228 4895270 What have you done?

4896355 4898482 You have the power
to make anything happen...
4898565 4900484 but you must act now.

5184810 5189022 I knew you could do it, John.
You have their power now.

5189106 5191358 -You control their machines.
-Where's Emma?

5192526 5196947 She's not Emma anymore.
She has been reimprinted.

5196947 5199283 -So give her back her memories.
-I can't.

5199324 5203412 The facility where they stored
the memories has been destroyed.
5206623 5208584 What are you going to do now?
5211587 5213088 I'm gonna fix things.

5214715 5218010 You told me I had the power,
didn't you?

5219011 5221930 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5223015 5225058 Make this world
anything I want it to be.

5226268 5230314 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.
5313981 5315232 Where are you going?
5318694 5319695 Shell Beach.

5361028 5362529 -What's the fare?
-A quarter.
5419378 5421380 Been waiting for you, yes?

5422047 5426385 -What are you doing?
-I'm just making a few changes.

5426385 5431306 -We're sure that's what we want?
-I'll take my chances.

5431390 5437145 I'm dying, John. Your imprint
is not agreeable with my kind.

5437229 5439356 But I wanted to know
what it was like.
5441066 5442693 How you feel.

5442776 5445445 You know how I was
supposed to feel.

5445487 5449575 That person isn't me.
Never was.

5449616 5452828 You wanted to know what it was
that makes us human.

5453912 5457749 Well, you're not going to
find it in here.

5459334 5461128 You went looking
in the wrong place.
5560394 5562187 It's so beautiful here.

5575158 5577202 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
5577953 5580330 I think that's it over there.
5598599 5600601 I'm headed that way myself.
5602603 5603937 Would you like to join me?

5613488 5617034 I'm Anna, by the way.
What's your name?

5617242 5621997 John..
John Murdoch.
